text:
Here's The Teaser For The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones And It's A Battle Of Fire And Ice
Here's The Teaser For The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones And It's A Battle Of Fire And Ice
The much awaited first teaser of the final season of "Game of Thrones" has been unveiled.
screengrab
The teaser, titled Dragonstone (which is the ancestral seat of House Targaryen), starts by showing ice apparently taking over Westeros. Some theories say that the clash between fire and the ice is when the Dragonstone forms.
The 54 second-long clip promises to show a battle between fire and ice. Watch.
The internet is in a bit of shocking after watching the teaser. While some are elated, some are upset that the teaser does not show anything.
GOT teaser gives me anxiety attacks — Näzarah Tefinkjian (@zarah_jan) December 7, 2018
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 842 SHARES
Me forming theories from the teaser... pic.twitter.com/9Ccm96O7A8 — Ghostwalker (@Ghostwalker_019) December 6, 2018
#GameOfThrones teaser:
THE WOLF AND THE DRAGON FREEZE AND THE LION IS ON FIRE.
WHAT THE HELL!???#GoTS8 pic.twitter.com/0Qf4P0Bjt9 — Valeria (@valeriasworld23) December 6, 2018
IM NOT OVER IT OMFG I CANT WHY DID I JUST SEE THE TEASER IM NOT READY APRIL NEEDS TO COME NOW BUT I DONT WANT GAME OF THRONES TO BE OVER OMFG HELP pic.twitter.com/XYvahwQZbB — lǝʇʇǝɹɓ 🎄 (@kermitsnoodles) December 7, 2018
Jonsa got me freezing and burning like the #GameOfThrones S8 teaser. pic.twitter.com/mDpSBgn65d — Too School For Cool (@MadMakNY) December 7, 2018
game of thrones has released its first teaser trailer im-- pic.twitter.com/e2cZOPLGMJ — stormborn (@RNMNVLR) December 6, 2018
GAME OF THRONES TEASER pic.twitter.com/w5fA7gA6cB — 🎄the first noel / [nouwɛl]🎄 (@Noeliosiss) December 6, 2018
The show is returning in April 2019 and clearly the fans just can't wait as this also happens to be the final season.
title: Here's The Teaser For The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones And It's A Battle Of Fire And Ice
